DefaultEvent.Description: The zailors nod approvingly. "Storm don't like change," one points out. ("But Salt does," one murmurs uneasily...)
DefaultEvent.Name: Aestival it is

ChildBranches.Name: "Aestival."
ChildBranches.Description: It's still a good name. Why change it?

DefaultEvent.Description: Someone strikes up a jig: 'The Last Voyage of the Travelling Man'. The quartermaster passes out grog. Your crew enthusiastically baptises the island.
DefaultEvent.Name: "Lastport it is."

ChildBranches.Name: "Lastport."
ChildBranches.Description: Here you are at the edge of the world.

DefaultEvent.Description: The zailors cheer delightedly. Who doesn't like freedom, after so long under ship's discipline?
DefaultEvent.Name: "Freedom it is."

ChildBranches.Name: "Freedom."
ChildBranches.Description: Here no laws will bind you, unless you so choose.

DefaultEvent.Description: Some zailors are better read than others. "Utopia?" one asks warily. "Like the fruit?" But others clap you on the back and assure you of their devotion to the project.
DefaultEvent.Name: A slightly uncertain cheer

ChildBranches.Name: "Utopia Beneath."
ChildBranches.Description: You'll be the perfect monarch: enlightened, merciful, absolute.

DefaultEvent.Description: The zailors cheer, although, it seems, for a variety of reasons. "I knew a girl called Sophia once," one muses nostalgically. In any case, all agree the name has a fortunate sound to it.
DefaultEvent.Name: Sophia it is

ChildBranches.Name: "Sophia."
ChildBranches.Description: 'Wisdom' would be a great name, but it's taken... by a Khanate prison. So stick with the classics.

DefaultEvent.Description: A heartfelt cheer! "I knew you was lucky, Captain," one zailor assures you. "And you're lucky with yer names."
DefaultEvent.Name: Fiddler's Gold it is

ChildBranches.Name: "Fiddler's Gold."
ChildBranches.Description: Fiddler's Green is the legendary zailors' paradise. Fiddler's Gold would be one better.

DefaultEvent.Description: Your crew agrees it has a pleasing sound. "And no shortage of peaches," one hastens to assure you.
DefaultEvent.Name: Peachtree Isle it is.

DefaultEvent.Description: The crew break into scattered, rather nervous applause. But you see grins here and there. "We'll show them!" one zailor mutters fiercely.
DefaultEvent.Name: B____r Off it is.

ChildBranches.Name: "B____r Off."
ChildBranches.Description: It's going to be your island. Give it a name that discourages visitors.

DefaultEvent.Description: Your zailors applaud, a little ironically, but approvingly. "We'll be rich, cap'n, eh?" one cackles.
DefaultEvent.Name: Head Office it is.

ChildBranches.Name: "Head Office."
ChildBranches.Description: Somewhere from which to pursue your business interests.

DefaultEvent.Description: Zailors nod - some, you think, a little wistfully. "We'll be safe here, aye, cap'n?" one sighs.
DefaultEvent.Name: Sanctuary it is.

DefaultEvent.Description: Laughter and cheers rise in equal measure. "All hail the Emperor!" one zailor shouts. It isn't clear - perhaps not even clear to him - whether he's being ironical.
DefaultEvent.Name: An Empire it is.

ChildBranches.Name: "The Empire of Trees"
ChildBranches.Description: It's a little grand, and a little ridiculous, but it shows vision. If not a sense of proportion.

DefaultEvent.Description: The zailors raise a patriotic cheer. "London!" one cries. "May it never be buried like the other one!"
DefaultEvent.Name: New London it is

ChildBranches.Name: "New London."
ChildBranches.Description: One day, you'll remake the city that birthed your ship.

Description: In the folklore of the zee, this place is Aestival. What will you call it?
Name: Naming your colony
